name: document-generation-showcase-backend
description: Documentation, Code Templates and a Showcase application to demonstrate features of the Natural Resources' Document Generation Service
author: NR Common Service Showcase <NR.CommonServiceShowcase@gov.bc.ca>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.all:test: npm run test && cd frontend && npm run test:unit
scripts.all:lint: npm run lint && cd frontend && npm run lint
scripts.all:lint-fix: npm run lint:fix && cd frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.all:ci: npm ci && cd frontend && npm ci
scripts.all:install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.all:clean: npm run clean && cd frontend && npm run clean
scripts.all:purge: npm run purge && cd frontend && npm run purge
scripts.all:rebuild: npm run rebuild && cd frontend && npm run rebuild
scripts.all:reinstall: npm run reinstall && cd frontend && npm run reinstall
scripts.all:fresh-start: npm run all:reinstall && npm run all:rebuild && npm run all:start
